author: imario
msg: TOMAHAWK-780: added content-length to served resources - if possible

author: mturyn
msg: Added xap.widgets.dojo.RichtextTooltip to use html in tooltips.
Adjusted AbstractWidgetBridge.setTooltipAttribute() to use the new class.
(Super-secret easter egg:  you can use '\n' or '\r' instead of <br/> .)

author: taylor
msg: this commit covers the importing implementation of the serializer for all seed data
we now have full import and export round trip on all seed data except OJB tables

author: djd
msg: DERBY-1030 (partial) Remove test cases from functions.sql that are covered in RoutineTest (junit test).

author: jkuhnert
msg: Fixes for TAPESTRY-1150. Was using asset service to generate urls when I could've just called IAsset.buildURL(). This now
properly allows for using context based dojo/etc includes.
Also fixed tapestry.namespace to properly detect a module registration path for tapestry js modules and act appropriately.
